title: Refreshing Calais Harbour Stay near Beach & Ferry Port
description: Savour views of the Strait of Dover and the sound of lapping waves when you stay at Holiday Inn Calais, an IHG Hotel. This modern hotel is located within arm's reach of the city's most significant destinations, including the Ferry Port, Notre-Dame church, Museum of Fine Arts and the golden shores of Calais Beach. When you're not exploring, stay in and enjoy a bite at the hotel's harbour-view restaurant which serves up French cuisine alongside your favourite breakfast items daily.
location_description: Holiday Inn Calais, an IHG Hotel
